title: Parissa No-Strip Face & Lip Hot Wax Kit for Short & Coarse Hair Removal At-Home Waxing Kit on Face, Chin, and Upper Lip, Blue

description: Parissa Face & Lip Hot Wax Kit has everything you need for long-lasting smooth skin at home. Made with nourishing beeswax, this non-toxic hard wax formula gently targets unwanted facial hair at the root. Simply warm it on an electric stove or with the Parissa Mini Pro Wax Warmer. For post-wax pampering, weâ€™ve included our Parissa Ultra Soothe Oil, a blend of natural botanicals to help cleanse and calm skin. Our Hot Wax is gentle and effective. As it warms, the wax transforms into a rich consistency that glides onto the skin and grabs short and coarse hair. Once firm, the wax becomes the strip. Gently and quickly peel off. Enjoy smooth skin for weeks.
